statements.statement: SELECT ty.QUEUE_TYPE_CODE RESULT FROM QMS_QUEUE B inner join QMS_QUEUE_TYPE ty on B.QUEUETYPE_ID=ty.ID WHERE B.DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$' AND B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT A.ID,A.KIOSK_ID,A.QUEUE_ID,A.DISPLAYTEXT,B.DEPARTMENT_ID,C.DEPARTMENT_NAME,A.PRIORITY, A.REMARKS FROM QMS_KIOSK_QUEUE A INNER JOIN QMS_QUEUE B ON A.QUEUE_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN QMS_DEPARTMENT C ON B.DEPARTMENT_ID=C.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE B.QUEUETYPE_ID='$QUEUETYPE_ID$' AND B.STATE = 1 AND B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT B.ID,B.DEPARTMENT_ID,C.DEPARTMENT_NAME, C.DEPT_CODE, B.[NAME] as QUEUENAME,B.ID as QUEUE_ID FROM QMS_QUEUE B INNER JOIN QMS_DEPARTMENT C ON B.DEPARTMENT_ID=C.DEPARTMENT_ID JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT SECTION_ID FROM QMS_QUEUE WHERE DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$') A ON A.SECTION_ID = B.SECTION_ID WHERE B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND b.NAME!='KhongCapSTT' AND B.STATE = 1

SELECT B.ID,B.DEPARTMENT_ID,C.DEPARTMENT_NAME, C.DEPT_CODE, B.[NAME] as QUEUENAME,B.ID as QUEUE_ID FROM QMS_QUEUE B INNER JOIN QMS_DEPARTMENT C ON B.DEPARTMENT_ID=C.DEPARTMENT_ID JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT XX.SECTION_ID FROM QMS_QUEUE XX JOIN QMS_CLIENT YY ON YY.QUEUE_ID = XX.ID WHERE XX.DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$' AND (YY.COMPUTERNAME = '$COMPUTERNAME$' OR YY.IPADDRESS = '$IPADDRESS$')) A ON A.SECTION_ID = B.SECTION_ID WHERE B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND B.STATE = 1
SELECT * FROM QMS_QUEUE_GROUP WHERE CODE='$CODE$' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT * FROM QMS_QUEUE_TYPE WHERE QUEUEGROUP_ID='$QUEUEGROUP_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT B.QUEUETYPE_ID FROM QMS_QUEUE B WHERE B.DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$' AND B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT B.ID FROM QMS_QUEUE_TYPE B WHERE B.QUEUE_TYPE_CODE='$QUEUE_TYPE_CODE$' AND B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT 0 CHON,A.QUEUE_ID,A.[ORDER],A.CLIENT_ID,CLIENT_NAME,A.SEQUENCE,A.DISPLAYTEXT AS STT,A.PATIENTCODE,A.PATIENTNAME,A.PATIENTYOB ,(CASE WHEN A.STATE=1 THEN N'Đang chờ' ELSE (CASE WHEN A.STATE=0 THEN N'Đang thực hiện' ELSE N'Bỏ qua' END) END) AS TRANGTHAI,A.STATE, A.ISMATOATHUOC FROM QMS_QUEUE_ITEM A INNER JOIN QMS_QUEUE B ON A.QUEUE_ID = B.ID AND B.DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$' INNER JOIN QMS_QUEUE_TYPE C ON B.QUEUETYPE_ID = C.ID WHERE B.DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$' AND A.STATE IN(0,1,3) AND A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND C.QUEUE_TYPE_CODE='$QUEUE_TYPE_CODE$' and A.CREATEDATE= CAST(GETDATE() as date) ORDER BY A.[ORDER],A.[STATE]

SELECT A.SEQUENCE,A.DISPLAYTEXT AS STT,B.NAME AS CLIENT_NAME, A.[ORDER], A.[STATE], A.QUEUE_ID FROM QMS_QUEUE_ITEM A INNER JOIN QMS_QUEUE C ON A.QUEUE_ID = C.ID AND A.QUEUE_ID = '$QUEUE_ID$' INNER JOIN QMS_CLIENT B ON A.QUEUE_ID = B.QUEUE_ID inner join QMS_QUEUE_TYPE D ON C.QUEUETYPE_ID=D.ID WHERE A.QUEUE_ID = '$QUEUE_ID$' AND A.STATE = 1 AND A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND B.ID = '$CLIENT_ID$' AND D.QUEUE_TYPE_CODE='TN' ORDER BY A.[ORDER]

SELECT B.ID as QUEUE_ID, B.NAME AS QUEUE_NAME,A.ID AS CLIENT_ID , A.[NAME] AS CLIENT_NAME, ISNULL(A.[STATE],1) AS [STATE],(CASE C.NAME WHEN 'UT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS QUEUETYPE , B.DEPARTMENT_ID,ISNULL(B.SECTION_ID,-1) AS SECTION_ID,A.IPSERVER,A.NAMEAUDIO,C.QUEUE_TYPE_CODE,S.[NAME] AS SECTIONNAME FROM QMS_QUEUE B LEFT JOIN QMS_CLIENT A ON A.QUEUE_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN QMS_QUEUE_TYPE C ON B.QUEUETYPE_ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN QMS_SECTION S ON B.SECTION_ID=S.ID WHERE (A.COMPUTERNAME = '$COMPUTERNAME$' OR A.IPADDRESS = '$IPADDRESS$') AND A.[STATE] = 1 AND B.DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$'
AND B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT B.ID as QUEUE_ID, B.NAME AS QUEUE_NAME,A.ID AS CLIENT_ID , A.[NAME] AS CLIENT_NAME, ISNULL(A.[STATE],1) AS [STATE],(CASE C.NAME WHEN 'UT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS QUEUETYPE , B.DEPARTMENT_ID,ISNULL(B.SECTION_ID,-1) AS SECTION_ID,A.IPSERVER,A.NAMEAUDIO,C.QUEUE_TYPE_CODE,S.[NAME] AS SECTIONNAME FROM QMS_QUEUE B LEFT JOIN QMS_CLIENT A ON A.QUEUE_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN QMS_QUEUE_TYPE C ON B.QUEUETYPE_ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN QMS_SECTION S ON B.SECTION_ID=S.ID WHERE B.ID='$QUEUE_ID$' AND B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT A.ID AS QUEUE_ID, A.NAME AS QUEUE_NAME, A.QUEUETYPE_ID AS QUEUE_TYPE_ID, B.NAME AS QUEUE_TYPE_NAME FROM QMS_QUEUE A JOIN QMS_QUEUE_TYPE B ON A.QUEUETYPE_ID = B.ID WHERE A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT 0 CHON,QUEUE_ID,[ORDER],CLIENT_ID,CLIENT_NAME,[SEQUENCE],DISPLAYTEXT AS STT,PATIENTCODE,PATIENTNAME,PATIENTYOB ,(CASE WHEN [STATE] = 0 THEN N'Đang thực hiện' ELSE (CASE WHEN [STATE] = 1 THEN N'Đang chờ' ELSE (CASE WHEN [STATE] = 2 THEN N'Đã thực hiện xong' ELSE (CASE WHEN [STATE] = 3 THEN N'Gọi nhỡ' ELSE N'Bỏ qua' END) END) END) END ) AS TRANGTHAI,[STATE] FROM QMS_QUEUE_ITEM WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND QUEUE_ID = '$QUEUE_ID$'

SELECT 0 CHON,A.QUEUE_ID,A.[ORDER],A.CLIENT_ID,CLIENT_NAME,A.SEQUENCE,A.DISPLAYTEXT AS STT,A.PATIENTCODE,A.PATIENTNAME,A.PATIENTYOB ,(CASE WHEN A.STATE=1 THEN N'Đang chờ' ELSE N'Đang thực hiện' END) AS TRANGTHAI,A.STATE FROM QMS_QUEUE_ITEM A INNER JOIN QMS_QUEUE B ON A.QUEUE_ID = B.ID AND B.DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$' WHERE B.DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$' AND A.STATE IN(0,1) AND A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND PATIENTCODE = '$PATIENTCODE$' ORDER BY A.[ORDER],A.[STATE]
SELECT VALUE FROM QMS_PARAMETER WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND CODE = '$CODE$'

SELECT C.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS TENPHONGBAN, A.QUEUE_ID AS QUEUE_IDBYQUEUEITEM, A.DISPLAYTEXT FROM (QMS_QUEUE_ITEM A JOIN QMS_QUEUE B ON A.QUEUE_ID = B.ID) JOIN QMS_DEPARTMENT C ON B.DEPARTMENT_ID = C.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND A.PATIENTCODE = '$PATIENTCODE$' AND A.[STATE] = 1
SELECT B.DEPT_CODE FROM QMS_QUEUE A JOIN QMS_DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPARTMENT_ID = B.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND A.ID = '$QUEUE_ID$'

SELECT DISPLAYTEXT, PRIORITY, [ORDER], [SEQUENCE] FROM QMS_QUEUE_ITEM WHERE QUEUE_ID = '$QUEUE_ID$' AND (PATIENTCODE = '$PATIENTCODE$' OR [DISPLAYTEXT] = '$DISPLAYTEXT$') AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT PATIENTCODE, [ORDER] FROM QMS_QUEUE_ITEM WHERE QUEUE_ID = '$QUEUE_ID$' AND (DISPLAYTEXT = '$DISPLAYTEXT$' OR PATIENTCODE = '$PATIENTCODE$' OR [ORDER] = '$ORDER$') AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT [ORDER], PATIENTCODE FROM QMS_QUEUE_ITEM WHERE QUEUE_ID = '$QUEUE_ID$' AND [STATE] = 3 and CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CREATEDATE,103) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),103) AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT [SEQUENCE],[ORDER],DISPLAYTEXT, PATIENTCODE FROM QMS_QUEUE_ITEM WHERE QUEUE_ID = '$QUEUE_ID$' AND ([DISPLAYTEXT] = '$DISPLAYTEXT$' OR PATIENTCODE = '$PATIENTCODE$')
[STATE] in ($STATE$)
AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CREATEDATE,103) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),103) AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT A.NAME, A.DEPARTMENT_ID, A.QUEUETYPE_ID, A.REMARKS, A.SCREEN_ID, A.SECTION_ID, B.QUEUE_TYPE_CODE, B.QUEUEGROUP_ID, PB.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM QMS_QUEUE A INNER JOIN QMS_QUEUE_TYPE B ON A.QUEUETYPE_ID = B.ID INNER JOIN QMS_DEPARTMENT PB ON PB.DEPARTMENT_ID = A.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE B.QUEUE_TYPE_CODE = '$QUEUE_TYPE_CODE$' and A.STATE = 1

SELECT B.ID,B.DEPARTMENT_ID,C.DEPARTMENT_NAME, C.DEPT_CODE FROM QMS_QUEUE B INNER JOIN QMS_DEPARTMENT C ON B.DEPARTMENT_ID=C.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND B.STATE = 1 AND C.DEPARTMENT_ID IN ($LIST_DEPARTMENT_ID$)

SELECT DATA1.DISPLAYTEXT AS STT, Data2.MANGUOIBENH, Data2.TENNGUOIBENH, C.NAMSINH, B.DEPARTMENT_ID FROM dbo.QMS_QUEUE_ITEM DATA1 INNER JOIN QMS_QUEUE B ON B.ID = DATA1.QUEUE_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.DISPLAYTEXT AS STT, A.PATIENTCODE AS MANGUOIBENH, A.PATIENTNAME AS TENNGUOIBENH, B.DEPARTMENT_ID FROM dbo.QMS_QUEUE_ITEM A INNER JOIN QMS_QUEUE B ON B.ID = A.QUEUE_ID WHERE B.NAME = 'QuiTrinh1DaySTTToanVien' AND A.CREATEDATE = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND ( ( ISNULL('$TEXT_FILTER$', 0) != 0 AND ( A.DISPLAYTEXT = '$TEXT_FILTER$' OR A.PATIENTCODE = '$TEXT_FILTER$' ) ) OR ( ISNULL('$TEXT_FILTER$', 0) = 0 AND 1 = 1 ) ) ) Data2 ON DATA1.DISPLAYTEXT = Data2.STT LEFT JOIN dbo.TT_BENHNHAN C ON Data2.MANGUOIBENH = C.MAYTE WHERE DATA1.QUEUE_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM dbo.QMS_QUEUE WHERE QUEUETYPE_ID = 1 AND NAME != 'QuiTrinh1DaySTTToanVien' ) AND B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT * FROM QMS_QUEUE WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND STATE = 1
SELECT * FROM QMS_SCREEN WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT * FROM QMS_PARAMETER WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT * FROM QMS_CLIENT WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT * FROM QMS_QUEUE_TYPE WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT AA.*,BB.NAME AS QUEUENAME, BB.DEPARTMENT_ID FROM QMS_QUEUE_ITEM AA INNER JOIN QMS_QUEUE BB ON AA.QUEUE_ID=BB.ID AND AA.CREATEDATE>GETDATE()-1 WHERE AA.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
BB.NAME='$QUEUENAME$'
AA.PATIENTCODE='$PATIENTCODE$'
AA.QUEUE_ID=$QUEUE_ID$

INSERT INTO QMS_QUEUE_ITEM (QUEUE_ID,CREATEDATE,[ORDER],[SEQUENCE],PATIENTCODE,PATIENTNAME,PATIENTYOB,PREFIX,DISPLAYTEXT,SUFFIX,PREVIOUS,[PRIORITY],[STATE],ESTIMATETIME,CREATETIME,BENHVIEN_ID,NGAYTAO,REMARKS,ISMATOATHUOC) VALUES (#QUEUE_ID#,#CREATEDATE#,#ORDER#,#SEQUENCE#,#PATIENTCODE#,#PATIENTNAME#,#PATIENTYOB#,#PREFIX#,#DISPLAYTEXT#,#SUFFIX#,#PREVIOUS#,#PRIORITY#,#STATE#,#ESTIMATETIME#,#CREATETIME#,#BENHVIEN_ID#,#NGAYTAO#,#REMARKS#,#ISMATOATHUOC#)
UPDATE QMS_QUEUE_ITEM SET STATE=#STATE#,PROCESSTIME=#PROCESSTIME#,FINISHTIME=#FINISHTIME#,CLIENT_NAME=#CLIENT_NAME#,CLIENT_ID=#CLIENT_ID# WHERE QUEUE_ID=$QUEUE_ID$ AND PATIENTCODE='$PATIENTCODE$'
UPDATE QMS_QUEUE_ITEM SET STATE=#STATE#,PROCESSTIME=#PROCESSTIME#,FINISHTIME=#FINISHTIME#,CLIENT_NAME=#CLIENT_NAME#,CLIENT_ID=#CLIENT_ID# WHERE QUEUE_ID=$QUEUE_ID$ AND [SEQUENCE]='$SEQUENCE$'
UPDATE QMS_QUEUE_ITEM SET PATIENTNAME=#PATIENTNAME#,PATIENTYOB=#PATIENTYOB# WHERE PATIENTCODE='$PATIENTCODE$'

UPDATE QMS_QUEUE_ITEM SET PATIENTCODE=#PATIENTCODE#, PATIENTNAME=#PATIENTNAME#,PATIENTYOB=#PATIENTYOB# WHERE DISPLAYTEXT='$DISPLAYTEXT$' AND CREATEDATE=CONVERT(datetime,'$CREATEDATE$') AND QUEUE_ID IN(SELECT ID FROM QMS_QUEUE WHERE NAME='QuiTrinh1DaySTTToanVien')
UPDATE QMS_QUEUE SET TENBACSI=#TENBACSI#, TENDIEUDUONG=#TENDIEUDUONG# WHERE DEPARTMENT_ID=$DEPARTMENT_ID$
UPDATE QMS_QUEUE_ITEM SET STATE=1 WHERE DISPLAYTEXT='$DISPLAYTEXT$' AND CREATEDATE=CONVERT(datetime,'$CREATEDATE$') AND DEPARTMENT_ID='$DEPARTMENT_ID$' AND STATE=100
